coupons statement Thursday, Google's Eric Schmidt , announced that he will hand over the title of chief executive to Google co-founder Larry Page in April. In a message sent out on Twitter, Eric Schmidt said: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed! Eric Schmidt , a tech industry veteran who was brought in 10 years ago to provide what some at the company called "adult supervision" for Google's young founders, will take on the role of executive chairman,

Page, who will become CEO in April, as a brilliant products person who has participated in every major decision Google has made during Eric Schmidt 's tenure. He said Sergey Brin , the other co-founder, will focus on the order of three big initiatives, on which Eric Schmidt didn't elaborate. Eric Schmidt also challenged the assertion that Google is locked in a competitive battle with Facebook. "We have a competitor called Microsoft( MSFT),"

His mother remembers him watching the news and saying This is Tony Smith with the 6 o'clock news. Tony was born in Chicago and is a graduate of Barry University in Miami.
